components.title: Help with operational costs
components.content:
We're looking to understand your full operational costs for running the asset once you take ownership.

This includes your sources of income and regular costs, as well as a summary of your expected cash flow for the next few years.

We also need to make sure you're confident you'll spend any money awarded by this fund within 12 months.

You can use your business plan to provide information that supports your answers.

Running costs

Money used to regularly maintain the asset and keep it open to the community. This can include:

  • utility bills
  • gardening costs
  • security measures

If you've requested revenue funding, include the costs this funding will help cover.

You can use your business plan to provide information that supports your answers.
